mapper.insert: insert into jdbc_board(board_no, board_title, board_writer, board_date, board_cnt, board_content) values( board_seq.nextval, #{board_title}, #{board_writer}, sysdate, 0, #{board_content} )
mapper.update: update jdbc_board set board_title = #{board_title}, board_content = #{board_content}, board_date = sysdate where board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.select: select board_no, board_title, board_writer, board_cnt, to_char(board_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') board_date, board_content from jdbc_board order by board_no desc
select board_no, board_title, board_writer, board_cnt, to_char(board_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') board_date, board_content from jdbc_board where board_title like '%' || #{title} || '%' order by board_no desc
